section.p: On the clifftop above the door you discover a sinkhole with a faint glow of lamplight shining up from below. Lowering yourself down, you soon reach a cavern where two tall women with serpentine tresses are pacing to and fro like hungry cats.
‘Sister, there is a fresh mortal in our land,’ says one.
The other nods, causing the snakes of her head to hiss softly. ‘Yes, I feel it too. Tomorrow we shall hunt.’
